Applications are now being accepted to fill East Village Homes vacancies and replenish the waiting list. This building was constructed through the Neighborhood Construction Program and Inclusionary Housing Program of the New York City Housing Development Corporation and the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development. Individuals or households who meet the income and household size requirements listed in the table may apply. Qualified applicants will be required to meet additional selection criteria such as asset limits. No application fee. No broker's fee. Smoke-Free Building. https://riseboro.org/housing/woodlawn-se: Contact Us Join Us Annual Report Onsite Supportive Services Property Management Rental Assistance Program (ERAP) Onsite Supportive Services Property Management Rental Assistance Program (ERAP) Woodlawn Senior Living Description: Affordable, Social Services, built to passive house standards. Ground floor preschool facility with outdoor play area. We are currently accepting applications for brand-new affordable apartments through the Project-Based Voucher (PBV) Section 8 Program. This community has been designed with comfort, accessibility, and long-term affordability in mind. Program & Eligibility These apartments are reserved for individuals or households where at least one member is age 62 or older at the time of application. Eligibility is determined by both age and household size, as well as income limits. Applicants must qualify for Section 8 housing assistance. Rent is calculated at 30% of household income, as determined by Section 8 guidelines, and includes utilities. Maximum annual household income to apply: $56,700. This building is part of the Senior Affordable Rental Apartments (SARA) Program and supported through the HOME Investment Partnerships Program (HOME) of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development. What You‚Äôll Need to Apply While requirements may vary from household to household, applicants should be prepared to provide: Proof of income for all household members Valid identification for each resident Documentation verifying household size and eligibility No application fees or deposits are required Applicants selected will also undergo program verification to confirm Section 8 eligibility. Advantages & Amenities This thoughtfully designed building provides a safe, welcoming, and convenient environment for seniors. Amenities include: ‚Äì Shared laundry room with card-operated machines ‚Äì Dedicated storage space for residents ‚Äì Elevator access throughout the building ‚Äì Convenient access to public transportation (bus stop nearby) ‚Äì Outdoor common areas to relax and enjoy fresh air -Free parking is available through a lottery system, with electric vehicle charging offered at applicable rates. How to Apply Applying is simple and can be done in one of two ways: Click Here to Print Application Contact Us Join Us Annual Report Onsite Supportive Services Property Management Rental Assistance Program (ERAP) Volunteer Program Social RiseBoro Community Partnership is an equal opportunity employer/program. Our Location
1601 Bronxdale Avenue Bronx, NY 10462
Langsam Property Services Corp. is a Bronx-based real estate management company. The company is responsible for managing the day-to-day operation of approximately 350 buildings containing over 11,000 dwelling units and 300 commercial units. These buildings are located in the Bronx, Manhattan, Queens, Brooklyn, and lower Westchester County.
When Mark Engel joined the organization in the mid 1970s, it managed 2,500 housing units. Langsam is designated as an Accredited Management Organization (AMO), a standard of excellence in management conferred by the Chicago-based, Institute of Real Estate Management (IREM). Langsam is one of only two AMO's in all of New York State which has four Certified Property Managers directing its property management teams.
All of Langsam's managing agents are either Licensed Associate Real Estate Brokers or Sales Associates. Several are experienced in construction and design. Other professional staff have almost fifty years combined property management and support experience. Its Director of Operations holds a CPM designation and other staff hold advanced degrees in public finance and urban planning. Staff also have held high level positions in New York City government
Langsam Property Services does not discriminate based on race, color, religion, national origin, sex, disability, familial status (minor children under the age of 18), age, sexual orientation, marital status, military status, lawful source of income (including housing voucher programs), gender identity or expression, arrest records, veteran status, and domestic violence victim status.
